builds.name: Proficient carrier
builds.description: A transport vehicle designed to carry loads

lessons.title: 1.Dancing
lessons.objective: In this course, we mainly learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to make the Proficient carrier "sing" and "dance" at the same time, that is, the motor, servo, buzzer, and RGB light work at the same time.
lessons.phenomenon: In this course, we mainly learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to make the Proficient carrier "sing" and "dance" at the same time, that is, the motor, servo, buzzer, and RGB light work at the same time.

lessons.title: 2.Button control shovel
lessons.objective: In this course, we mainly learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to achieve that when the A button on the micro:bit motherboard is pressed, the shovel is placed flat; when the B button on the micro:bit motherboard is pressed, the shovel is unloaded; when the AB buttons on the micro:bit motherboard are pressed at the same time, the shovel is lifted.
lessons.phenomenon: In this course, we mainly learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to achieve that when the A button on the micro:bit motherboard is pressed, the shovel is placed flat; when the B button on the micro:bit motherboard is pressed, the shovel is unloaded; when the AB buttons on the micro:bit motherboard are pressed at the same time, the shovel is lifted.

lessons.title: 3.Transportation
lessons.objective: In this course, we mainly learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to achieve. After pressing the micro:bit A button of the micro:bit, the shovel is lifted -> forward 2 seconds -> unload the goods -> shovel is placed flat -> back 2 seconds.
lessons.phenomenon: In this course, we mainly learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to achieve. After pressing the micro:bit A button of the micro:bit, the shovel is lifted -> forward 2 seconds -> unload the goods -> shovel is placed flat -> back 2 seconds.

code.description: The summary program is shown in the figure below. You can also directly open the microbit-Transportation.hex file provided in this experiment and drag it into the browser that opens the URL, and the program diagram of this project source code will be automatically opened

lessons.title: 4.APP control
lessons.objective: In this course, we mainly learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to realize Bluetooth APP remote control of Proficient carrier.
lessons.phenomenon: In this course, we mainly learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to realize Bluetooth APP remote control of Proficient carrier.

lessons.title: 5.Micro:bit handle control
lessons.objective: In this course, we mainly learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to realize the control of Proficient carrier by microbit handle.
lessons.phenomenon: In this course, we mainly learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to realize the control of Proficient carrier by microbit handle.

lessons.title: 6.WiFi camera control
lessons.objective: In this course, we mainly learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to achieve WiFi remote control of Proficient carrier.

builds.name: Skip car
builds.description: A hopping vehicle with unique movement mechanics

lessons.title: 1.Dance battle
lessons.objective: In this course, we mainly learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to make Skip car "sing" and "dance" at the same time, that is, the motor, servo, buzzer, and RGB light work at the same time.

lessons.title: 2.Button control skip car
lessons.objective: In this course, we mainly learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to achieve that when the A button on the micro:bit motherboard is pressed, the loading platform is laid flat; when the B button on the micro:bit motherboard is pressed, the loading platform is unloaded.
lessons.phenomenon: In this course, we mainly learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to achieve that when the A button on the micro:bit motherboard is pressed, the loading platform is laid flat; when the B button on the micro:bit motherboard is pressed, the loading platform is unloaded.

lessons.title: 3.Powerful carrier
lessons.objective: In this course, we mainly learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to achieve. After pressing the A button of micro:bit, the car moves forward for 2 seconds -> turns left for 1 second -> unloads the goods -> the loading platform is laid flat -> turns left for 1 second -> moves forward for 2 seconds.
lessons.phenomenon: In this course, we mainly learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to achieve. After pressing the A button of micro:bit, the car moves forward for 2 seconds -> turns left for 1 second -> unloads the goods -> the loading platform is laid flat -> turns left for 1 second -> moves forward for 2 seconds.

builds.name: Biped robot
builds.description: A two-legged walking robot

lessons.title: 1.Biped robot advance
lessons.objective: In this course, we mainly learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to achieve that when the A button on the micro:bit motherboard is pressed, the Lifting platform rises; when the B button on the micro:bit motherboard is pressed, the Lifting platform descends.
lessons.phenomenon: In this course, we mainly learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to achieve that when the A button on the micro:bit motherboard is pressed, the Lifting platform rises; when the B button on the micro:bit motherboard is pressed, the Lifting platform descends.

lessons.title: 2.Biped robot walk
lessons.objective: In this course, we mainly learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to realize Bluetooth APP remote control of Lifting platform.
lessons.phenomenon: 5.1 Download APP Android users, please use the mobile browser to scan the following QR code to download and install the APP; Apple users, please use the hand camera to scan the QR code to download and install the APP. ! Note: During the installation or use of the APP, if the mobile phone prompts that any permissions need to be obtained, please select "Agree". 5.2 APP remote control 1) After the program is downloaded successfully, turn on the power switch of the car, and the micro:bit dot matrix will display an "S" pattern, as shown in the figure below. This is the state of Bluetooth disconnection. 2) Turn on the Bluetooth of the mobile phone, open our APP, you can see the interface as shown in the figure below, click Allow APP to use positioning information . 3) After the mobile phone is close to the car and waits for a while, the Bluetooth will automatically connect; if it does not automatically connect, we can click [Search Bluetooth devices] to search for the device to connect. After the Bluetooth is successfully connected, a smiley face pattern will be displayed on the micro:bit dot matrix; if the Bluetooth is disconnected, a crying face pattern will be displayed on the dot matrix. [Bluetooth successful connection status] [Bluetooth disconnection status] APP interface function introduction: Main control interface: The forward button controls the platform to rise The backward button controls the platform to descend Press the piano key to hear the buzzer play different tones. Car light interface: RGB light interface: Due to the upgrade of micro:bit V2 motherboard, the Bluetooth code control deleted the RGB light control and changed to dot matrix display. The buttons under the mode options have no defined functions yet.

lessons.objective: In this course, we mainly learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to realize the microbit handle to control the Lifting platform.
lessons.phenomenon: In this course, we mainly learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to realize the microbit handle to control the Lifting platform.
